mapper.select:
SELECT TO.ID, TO.PROVINCEID, TO.VALID, TO.FULLADDRESS, TO.ALIAS, TO.CITYID, TO.CODE, TO.TYPE, TO.AREAID, TO.PARENTID, TO.ADDRESS, TO.CHIEFTYPE, TO.DESCRIPTION, TO.NAME, TO.FULLNAME, TO.CHIEFID FROM OPER_ORGANIZATION TO WHERE
AND TO.ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO OPER_ORGANIZATION ( ID, PROVINCEID, VALID, FULLADDRESS, ALIAS, CITYID, CODE, TYPE, AREAID, PARENTID, ADDRESS, CHIEFTYPE, DESCRIPTION, NAME, FULLNAME, CHIEFID ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{provinceId}, #{valid}, #{fullAddress}, #{alias}, #{cityId}, #{code}, #{type}, #{areaId}, #{parentId}, #{address}, #{chiefType}, #{description}, #{name}, #{fullName}, #{chiefId} )
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM OPER_ORGANIZATION TO WHERE
AND TO.ID = #{id}
mapper.update:
UPDATE OPER_ORGANIZATION TO
PROVINCEID = #{provinceId,javaType=java.lang.String},
VALID = #{valid,javaType=boolean},
FULLADDRESS = #{fullAddress,javaType=java.lang.String},
ALIAS = #{alias,javaType=java.lang.String},
CITYID = #{cityId,javaType=java.lang.String},
CODE = #{code,javaType=java.lang.String},
TYPE = #{type,javaType=com.tx.component.operator.model.OrganizationType},
AREAID = #{areaId,javaType=java.lang.String},
PARENTID = #{parentId,javaType=java.lang.String},
ADDRESS = #{address,javaType=java.lang.String},
CHIEFTYPE = #{chiefType,javaType=int},
DESCRIPTION = #{description,javaType=java.lang.String},
NAME = #{name,javaType=java.lang.String},
FULLNAME = #{fullName,javaType=java.lang.String},
CHIEFID = #{chiefId,javaType=int},
WHERE TO.ID = #{id}
